job.title: Marketing Data Consultant, Senior - Healthcare
job.description:
Do you enjoy using your analytical skills to be the one-and-only
Data Scientist
on the Marketing Team? Do you enjoy collaborating and building relationships with key partners to help support the organization’s data goals for health plan products that are highly compliance and government regulated? As a Marketing & Communications Consultant, Senior you will manage the data and analytical marketing projects for the WellFirst Health Plan - provided by SSM Health Plan in MO and IL along with providing additional support for initiatives with Dean Health Plan and Prevea360 Health Plan in WI for the Medicare & ACA Health Insurance Plans.
What You’ll Do: Primary Focus Areas
Use analytics methods to extract value from business data
Work with statistical models to support segmentation and personalization
Share results with both technical and non-technical audiences
Hands-on experience using large datasets to draw business insights
Data Work: analysis, proofing, appending, sftp pickup/delivery
Excel work (macros, splitting, formulas, vlookups)
Targeting, segmentation, and personalization of data
Data Visualization: Charts, Visio, Presentations, Etc.
IDN (Integrated Delivery Network) Marketing Projects: Coordinate data with hospitals and clinics, clinic/hospitals visits (refill brochure inventory) and occasionally onsite events at Care locations
Surveys + Analysis/Reporting
Market Research; Marketing/Advertising Strategic Analysis; Market/Geographic Strategic Analysis
Spread best practices of analytics to stakeholders and across the marketing team
Manage marketing projects: copywriting and project management in Workfront
Candidates give best consideration will have the following:
Understanding of how analytics and data impact marketing and advertising
Strong analytical skills
Highly proficient in Microsoft Excel
Self-starter
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
This position is
based in the WellFirst Health St. Louis
, MO office with 1-2 days a week an option for remote work.
Read more
at https://ssmh.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/ssmhealth/job/MO-SSM-Health-Westview-Building/Marketing---Communications-Consultant--Senior--St-Louis-_R34097
